description.para: Types typically defined in <stdint.h>, define manually if stdint.h is not available on this platform.

briefdescription.para: Variable that can hold 0 or 1, may be an int for speed purporses or uint8_t for size optimization.
Header for DOS platform (using Watcom C cross compiler).

detaileddescription.para: This file is automatically included by xbee/platform.h.
